name: REscape
description:
Web Version Notice

On some browsers, the game lagged at later levels, and the Boss Fight was completely unplayable, so I had to take it down unfortunately. Sorry about that :/

On the bright side though, the download version works fine and well, so enjoy! :D

And feel free to send any feedback on my game if you want :p

REscape

In this reboot of the original title, you once again play as a kid named Nicholas, who does not know where he is and must find his way out while dealing with a mysterious figure who keeps him from doing so by putting obstacles in his way in hopes of keeping him there. Luckily, Nicholas soon finds some help along the way. Will Nicholas be able to Escape? Play this game to find out!

Controls

A/D or Left/Right: Move

W/Up: Enter Door

Spacebar: Jump

Enter: Go to next comic strip

Credits

Programming and art done by me(@QUICKALAS529)

Level sprites made by FelixBlobDev(@KirbyPwnage)

Music made by Modal Module(@modalmodule)
